sentences.sContent: There, she worked as a low-level intelligence analyst helping her unit assess insurgent activity in the area.
sentences.sContent_eng: There, she worked as a low-level intelligence analyst helping her unit assess insurgent activity in the area.
sentences.sCn: 在那里，她是一名初级情报分析员，工作内容是帮助所在部队评估该地区的叛乱活动。

sentences.sContent: But new reports show a sharp rise in insurgent attacks -- including a 55% increase in children being injured.
sentences.sContent_eng: But new reports show a sharp rise in insurgent attacks -- including a 55% increase in children being injured.
sentences.sCn: 但有新的报告显示，叛乱者发动的袭击数量大幅上升，儿童受伤人数也上升了55%。

remMethod.val: in(内部) + surge(浪涛； 升起) + nt → 内部起浪潮 → 叛乱的

trans.tranOther: one of a group of people fighting against the government of their own country, or against authority
